name: Protect The Planet (Soglank9)
description: It's time for you to become a commando officer of the new planet colonized in this game, you are responsible for dealing with all the dangers that are not unexpected in this game planet.  Fend off an alien invasion and colliding asteroids while filling the planet with new citizens and buildings to be in place.  Let's show how great and long you will survive in this game, let's get ready to save your planet
